description:
A popular, inspiring, and intuitive font editor built to help you create amazing new fonts and edit existing fonts.


- New: Export Glyph Properties
- Fixed: Opening CFF2 based fonts did not set the glyph names
- Improved exporting PostScript CFF OpenType fonts
- Improved clipboard support between other vector editing software, like Adobe Illustrator
- macOS only: lock guidelines
- macOS only: show first and last point indicators
- macOS only: fixed several bugs related to editing anchor
- macOS only: Improved layout of OpenType Designer
- Numerous other improvements and bug fixes
